text:
1985 Gildersleeve Ave., adjoining the N.E. corner of Pugsley Ave.

About 1927.

W. B. Vernam.

(1) Pugsley's Creek, Bronx: A view eastward across the mouth of the creek, showing Screvin's Point (Castle Hill Park). The vantage point is the foot of Gildersleeve Ave.

P. L. Sperr. July 29, 1928.

(2) A view of the mouth of the creek at low tide.

P. L. Sperr. July 29, 1928.
title: Pugsley Creek - Bronx - Screvin's Point [Castle Hill Park.]
